scripts.allure:generate: export ALLURE_DIR=$(npm run -s allure:report-dir) && allure generate allure-results --clean -o $ALLURE_DIR
scripts.allure:postprocess: export ALLURE_DIR=$(npm run -s allure:report-dir) && node VisualTestingImplement/scripts/copy-visual-diffs-to-allure-attachments.js $ALLURE_DIR && node VisualTestingImplement/scripts/patch-allure-report-html.js $ALLURE_DIR
scripts.allure:full-report: npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:postprocess
